text: If f(x) = (x-3)^2 + 5, what is the minimum value of the function?
In the xy-plane, the point (p, r) lies on y = x + b. The point (2p, 5r) lies on y = 2x + b. What is the value of frac(r/p)?
A circle has center (5, 7) and radius 2. Which is the equation of the circle?
If g(x) = ax^2 + 24 and g(4) = 8, what is the value of g(-4)?
In triangle ABC, angle B is 90 degrees, BC=16, AC=20. What is the value of sin F in similar triangle DEF?
If 2n + 3 = 13, what is the value of 4n?
A car travels 25 miles per gallon of gas. If gas costs 3 dollars per gallon, how much does it cost to travel 100 miles?
If frac(x/y) = 6, what is the value of frac(4y/x)?
Which is equivalent to x^frac(1/2) * x^frac(1/3)?
A rectangular field has area 300 and perimeter 70. What is the length of the longer side?
If y = 3x + 1 and y = x + 3, what is the value of x?
What is the slope of the line 2x - 5y = 10?
If root(x-2) = 4, what is the value of x?
A bag has 3 red, 2 blue, and 5 green marbles. What is the probability of picking a blue marble?
If 3x + 9 = 18, what is the value of x?
A laptop costs 800 dollars. After a 20% discount, what is the price?
If the average of 3, 5, and x is 6, what is x?
What is the area of a triangle with base 10 and height 5?
If 2x - 4 = 10, what is x + 5?
How many minutes are in 2.5 hours?
If x^2 = 49 and x > 0, what is x?
What is 15% of 200?
